ModMetaData.name: OP Thingamagig Mod
ModMetaData.author: CHTech, Torodo
ModMetaData.description:
A colletion of OP items, first forked from Godly Traits and Godly Weapons by Torodo, then grown over time
~~~Frequently asked questions. The bellow ones are used in almost all the mods, so they are included FAQ Q: 1.5? A: It's there, might not work. when released, all errors for 1.5 will be fixed
Q: CE Compatible? A: Uh... sure. There might be "unintented features" that we can't guarentee to fix, but you do you and all!
